name: ILLUMINATED (Daniel W)
description:
ILLUMINATED

  • Use your mouse to move.
  • Use SPACE to boost.

All art, music and code written from scratch in 48 hours for GM48.

Known Bugs:

  • You cannot die. Oops.
  • Certain spawns appear right below the player... good job you can't die.
  • The questionable main audio actually loops somewhere and ends up multitudes more headache inducing. But play with headphones until it's unbearable.
  • Broken Lighting.
